codeGeneration.description: Generates 6-character uppercase alphanumeric codes. ~2.2 billion possible combinations minimize collision risk

sessionTimeout.description: Sessions are marked inactive after 60 minutes with no activity and cleaned up periodically

sessionPhases.name: Lobby
sessionPhases.description: Waiting for players to join before game starts

sessionPhases.name: Round Introduction
sessionPhases.description: Announcing the current round and judge

sessionPhases.name: Card Selection
sessionPhases.description: Players selecting cards to complete sentence

sessionStatus.name: Lobby
sessionStatus.description: Game waiting for players to join or start

sessionStatus.name: Inactive
sessionStatus.description: Game marked inactive due to timeout, eligible for cleanup

codeUniqueness.description: Before assigning a code, check if it exists in activeGameCodes Set. Retry up to 10 times on collision
codeUniqueness.rationale: With 2.2B possible codes and typical max ~1000 concurrent games, collision probability is negligible

sessionLookup.description: Sessions stored in Map with code as key for constant-time lookup

hostDisconnectBehavior.description: When host disconnects, session is marked for cleanup. Other players notified.

sessionCleanup.description: Sessions removed from active game registry after cleanup triggers
